alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:56AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kemper and northern Lauderdale Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1156 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Daleville, or 12 miles north of Meridian, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meridian Station around 1210 PM CDT. Lauderdale and Tamola around 1230 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
